title: State v. Terrance Lewis – Episode 3 – On the Testimony of One
itunes:subtitle: January 14, 2018 / Half a year after Bernard Howard was murdered, the police finally identified Terrance Lewis as a suspect after receiving a tip from a previously undisclosed source. At trial, though, the only evidence the prosecution used to make the...
content:encoded:
January 14, 2018 / Half a year after Bernard Howard was murdered, the police finally identified Terrance Lewis as a suspect after receiving a tip from a previously undisclosed source. At trial, though, the only evidence the prosecution used to make the case against Terrance and his co-defendants came from Star, the victim's girlfriend the first witness they spoke to.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon, Blue Dot Sessions.

THANK YOU to Boll & Branch for sponsoring this episode!

$50 off your first set of sheets. www.bollandbranch.com promo code UNDISCLOSED.
